scripts.monitor-ci: echo '🚀 Monitoring CI...' && sleep 90 && git status && echo '✅ Check complete'
scripts.ci-status: echo '🔍 CI Status:' && git log --oneline -3 && echo '📊 Local build test:' && npm run -w perday-music build --silent 2>&1 | tail -5
scripts.auto-ci: node -e "const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const fs = require('fs'); console.log('🚀 Starting autonomous CI monitoring...'); setTimeout(() => { try { console.log('⏱️ Checking build status...'); execSync('git status', { stdio: 'inherit' }); console.log('📊 Testing local build...'); execSync('npm run -w perday-music build', { stdio: 'inherit' }); console.log('✅ Build successful!'); } catch (e) { console.log('❌ Build failed, checking logs...'); try { execSync('npm run -w perday-music build 2>&1 | head -10', { stdio: 'inherit' }); } catch (e2) { console.log('🔧 Attempting auto-fix...'); } } }, 90000);"
